question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.
Please answer the following questions regarding your demographics.
What is your sex?
option_text: Male,Female,Choose not to respond

question_text: What is your marital status?
option_text: Single,Married,Separated,Divorced,Widowed

question_text: If you've been divorced, how many times?
What is your ethnic background?
option_text: American Indian or Alaska Native,Asian, Black or African American,Hispanic or Latino,Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander,White,Choose not to respond,Other

question_text: If you chose 'Other' for your ethnic background how would you describe it?
How many children do you have?
How tall are you (in inches - one foot = 12 inches)?
How much do you weigh?
How many traffic tickets have you gotten in the last year?
Altogether, have you smoked at least 100 or more cigarettes in your entire lifetime?
option_text: Yes,No

question_text: How long have you smoked (cumulatively)?
option_text: Less than a year,1 year,2 years, 3 years,4 years,5-10 years,More than 10 years,I don't smoke

question_text: Do you now smoke cigarettes every day, some days or not at all?
option_text: Every day,Some days,Not at all,I don't smoke

question_text: On average, how many cigarettes do you now smoke a day (1 pack = 20 cigarettes)?
option_text: Less than a cigarette a day,<5,5-10,10-20,1 pack,2 packs,More than 2 packs,I don't smoke

question_text: How soon after you wake up do you smoke your first cigarette?
option_text: Within 5 minutes,6-30 minutes,31-60 minutes,After 60 minutes,Don't know,I don't smoke

question_text: In the past 30 days, what tobacco products OTHER THAN cigarettes have you used (check all that apply)?
option_text: Chewing tobacco (dip),Cigars,Pipe,Tobacco for your nose (snuff),E-cigarettes,E-hookah or vape pens,Cigarillos or little cigars,Don't Know,I don't smoke

question_text: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
option_text: Never,Montly or less,2 to 4 times a month,2 to 3 times a week,4 or more times a week

question_text: How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking?
option_text: 1 or 2,3 or 4,5 or 6,7 8 or 9,10 or more

question_text: How often do you have six or more drinks on one occasion?
option_text: Never,Less than monthly,Monthly,Weekly,Daily or almost daily

question_text: How often during the last year have you found that you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?
option_text: Never,Less than monthly,Monthly,Weekly,Daily or almost daily

question_text: How often during the last year have you failed to do what was normally expected from you because of drinking?
option_text: Never,Less than monthly,Monthly,Weekly,Daily or almost daily

question_text: How often during the last year have you needed a first drink in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?
option_text: Never,Less than monthly,Monthly,Weekly,Daily or almost daily

question_text: How often during the last year have you had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?
option_text: Never,Less than monthly,Monthly,Weekly,Daily or almost daily

question_text: How often during the last year have you been unable to remember what happened the night before because you had been drinking?
option_text: Never,Less than monthly,Monthly,Weekly,Daily or almost daily

question_text: Have you or someone else been injured as a result of your drinking?
option_text: No,Yes but not in the last year,Yes during the last year,I don't drink

question_text: Has a relative or friend or a doctor or another health worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?
option_text: No,Yes but not in the last year,Yes during the last year,I don't drink

question_text: What is your daily caffeine intake (in mg)? (1 cup of regular coffee ~ 120 mg, 1 cup black tea ~ 50 mg, 1 cup green tea ~ 40 mg)
Do you have any chronic medical problems which continue to interfere with your life?
option_text: Yes,No

question_text: Are you taking any prescribed medication on a regular basis for a physical problem?
option_text: Yes,No

question_text: In addition to visits related to a chronic problem how often do you visit your doctor/have annual check ups in a year?
How many times in your life have you been arrested and/or charged with illigal activities?
Do you have a retirement account?
option_text: Yes,No

question_text: If you do have a retirement account what percent is in stocks?
Do you have any debt (credit card or other)?
option_text: Yes,No

question_text: If you have any debt how much (in dollars)?
Do you own or the house you live in?
option_text: Yes,No

question_text: What are you motivations for participating in this experiment?
option_text: money,tasks are fun,want to contribute to research,other

question_text: Please list other motivations.
Congratulations for completing this survey! Press finish to continue.
